mapper.select: SELECT r.employee_code, e.employee_name, r.res_state, r.res_date, e.position , COUNT(r.res_code) OVER(PARTITION BY r.res_code) AS "salesCount" , SUM(rdt.res_sales) OVER(PARTITION BY rdt.res_sales) AS "salesSum" FROM reservation_tbl r, host_tbl h, reservation_detail_tbl rdt, employee_tbl e WHERE h.host_code = r.host_code AND e.employee_code = r.employee_code AND rdt.res_detail_code = r.res_detail_code AND r.res_state = '서비스 완료' AND r.host_code = #{host_code} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(r.employee_code,2)) DESC

SELECT r.employee_code, e.employee_name, TO_CHAR(r.res_date, 'YYYY-MM')as "res_dates", SUM(rdt.res_sales) AS "salesSum" FROM reservation_tbl r, reservation_detail_tbl rdt, employee_tbl e WHERE r.res_detail_code = rdt.res_detail_code AND r.employee_code = e.employee_code AND r.res_state = '서비스 완료' AND r.employee_code= #{employee_code} GROUP BY r.employee_code, e.employee_name, TO_CHAR(r.res_date, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(r.employee_code,2)) DESC
